name: nativescript-directions
description: Leverage the native Maps app to show directions from and to anywhere you like.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove android && tns run android --justlaunch
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build android
scripts.test.ios: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios --emulator
scripts.test.ios.device: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios
scripts.test.android: cd ../demo && tns platform remove android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-directions && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
